channel.title: Texture Of The Water Light Effect
channel.description: Im creating a map to do with the aquatic side of Black Mesa and I am having trouble finding the texture found in one of the Surface Tension levels it is within the new c2a5g but whenever I locate the map file it will give me the older version, I also checked the map_dir files and it doesnt seem to be there.

item.title: Texture Of The Water Light Effect
item.dc:creator: Gerald_Foreman
item.description:
I already have as I said it is the older map in both the dir and mapsr

Read full topic
item.source: Texture Of The Water Light Effect
